# right

**Type Property**

The touch or touches swipe to the right.

## Declaration

```swift
static var right: UISwipeGestureRecognizer.Direction { get }
```

## Discussion

This direction is the default.

## Constants

- **left**: The touch or touches swipe to the left.
- **up**: The touch or touches swipe upward.
- **down**: The touch or touches swipe downward.
